EmailTemplate.name: Email Comment Notification to Case Owner
EmailTemplate.subject: New Comment on Case {!Case.CaseNumber}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Case.OwnerFirstName},
I have just updated your case {!Case.CaseNumber} with the status '{!Case.Status}' with a comment.
Please click on this link to read the case comment:
https://na8.salesforce.com/{!Case.Id}
